item.title: Gohugo Commands
item.description: Basic Hugo Commands Create a New Site: hugo new site <site-name> This initializes a new Hugo site in a directory named <site-name>. Create a New Content File: hugo new <section>/filename.md Creates a new content file in the specified section. For example, hugo new posts/my-first-post.md creates a new blog post in the posts section. Start the Development Server: hugo server Runs the Hugo development server, which watches your files and rebuilds the site automatically when changes are detected.
